languages.text: {n}Маражай позволяет себе издевательский смешок — в котором, однако, звенит нота сомнения.{/n} "Что заставило тебя думать, что я намерен..."
{n}Marazhai allows himself a mocking chuckle, but you hear the ring of doubt in it.{/n} "What makes you think I intend to—"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай позволяет себе издевательский смешок — в котором, однако, звенит нота сомнения.{/n} "Что заставило тебя думать, что я намерен..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai allows himself a mocking chuckle, but you hear the ring of doubt in it.{/n} "What makes you think I intend to—"

{n}Marazhai allows himself a mocking chuckle, but you hear the ring of doubt in it.{/n} "What makes you think I intend to—"
{n}Marazhai allows himself a mocking chuckle, but you hear the ring of doubt in it.{/n} "What makes you think I intend to—"

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋发出了嘲弄般的笑声，但你却从中听出了怀疑的味道。{/n}“你凭什么以为我打算——”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai allows himself a mocking chuckle, but you hear the ring of doubt in it.{/n} "What makes you think I intend to—"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋发出了嘲弄般的笑声，但你却从中听出了怀疑的味道。{/n}“你凭什么以为我打算——”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai s'autorise un rire moqueur, mais il vous semble y déceler une pointe de doute.{/n} « Et qu'est-ce qui vous fait croire que j'ai l'intention de... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai allows himself a mocking chuckle, but you hear the ring of doubt in it.{/n} "What makes you think I intend to—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai s'autorise un rire moqueur, mais il vous semble y déceler une pointe de doute.{/n} « Et qu'est-ce qui vous fait croire que j'ai l'intention de... »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se permite una risa burlona, pero notas un tono de duda en ella.{/n} «¿Y qué te hace pensar que pienso...».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai allows himself a mocking chuckle, but you hear the ring of doubt in it.{/n} "What makes you think I intend to—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se permite una risa burlona, pero notas un tono de duda en ella.{/n} «¿Y qué te hace pensar que pienso...».

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは自嘲するような笑みを浮かべるが、その中には疑念が潜んでいるのがわかった。{/n}「何がお前をそう思わせるのか―」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai allows himself a mocking chuckle, but you hear the ring of doubt in it.{/n} "What makes you think I intend to—"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは自嘲するような笑みを浮かべるが、その中には疑念が潜んでいるのがわかった。{/n}「何がお前をそう思わせるのか―」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gestattet sich ein spöttisches Lachen, doch du hörst Zweifel darin.{/n} "Warum glaubt Ihr, ich hätte vor -"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai allows himself a mocking chuckle, but you hear the ring of doubt in it.{/n} "What makes you think I intend to—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gestattet sich ein spöttisches Lachen, doch du hörst Zweifel darin.{/n} "Warum glaubt Ihr, ich hätte vor -"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, kendini zorlayıp alaylı alaylı gülse de sesinde hafif bir kuşku seziyorsun.{/n} "Acaba neden kalkıp da sana..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai allows himself a mocking chuckle, but you hear the ring of doubt in it.{/n} "What makes you think I intend to—"
